snippet: The bride, a vice president at a consulting firm, and the bridegroom, the press secretary for House Speaker John A. Boehner, marry in Mississippi.
lead_paragraph: Mary Kathryn Covert and Michael Anderson Steel were married Saturday evening at the First Baptist Church in Meridian, Miss. The Rev. David T. Bishop, an associate pastor at the church, performed the ceremony. The bride, 26, works in Washington as a vice president for public affairs at FTI Consulting, a business consultancy in Annapolis, Md. She graduated summa cum laude from Samford University in Birmingham, Ala.
